Redefining travel commerce

Search form

Search form

Our customers expect award-winning performance.
We deliver.

Awards

Travelport is determined to meet our customers’ needs by providing the tools, services and local market expertise you need to grow in a challenging business climate. Our travel commerce platform and our highly innovative professionals have received numerous business and industry awards that acknowledge our unique technology leadership. We appreciate the recognition we receive globally from industry associations, travel trade publications and most important, our partner travel agencies – but it’s our customers’ success that drives us. When you win, we win.

  • National Hidden Disability Awards

    Travelport Digital was recognized with an award for excellence for the outstanding achievements of employers who have improved the lives of people with a hidden disability and contributed to increased recognition of equality and human rights for all.

  • IBA 2017 Stevie Gold Winner

    eNett International won the Gold Stevie Award for fastest-growing company of the year for its hyper-growth performance.

  • IBA 2017 Stevie Silver Winner

    eNett International has been led to success by CEO and founder Anthony Hynes, whose leadership was recognized with a silver award for Executive of the Year in the financial services category. The company also earned a silver award for Marketing Campaign of the Year in the financial products & services category.

  • IBA 2017 Stevie Bronze Winner

    eNett International was awarded a Bronze award in the Corporate Social Responsibility Program of the Year for its CSR program ‘Repay the eNett Way’. This initiative was launched to aid underprivileged communities in high tourism growth countries.

  • 2017 International Business Awards

    Travelport Locomote announced as a Bronze winner for the category of "Company of the Year (Computer Software)"

  • Real IT Awards 2017

    Travelport wins highly commended honors at the Real IT Awards 2017 for our Open Distribution Model. The program combines attributes of hybird cloud and micro services with a number of other aligned technologies to deliver a next generation application.

  • Arabian Travel Awards - Best GDS

    Travelport has been recognized as the Best Global Distribution System in the Middle East at this year’s 2017 Arabian Travel Awards gala ceremony in Dubai

  • Excellence Policy Automation Award

    Recognized by Oracle for our work on improving customer experience through the implementation of an improved process using Oracle Policy Automation (OPA).

  • 2017 ATW Awards

    Travelport Digital and Singapore Airlines were announced winners in the category of ‘Onboard Experience’ at the 2017 ATW Awards which took place in New York

  • Travel Weekly Globe Travel Award

    Travelport wins Best Technology Provider at the UK's prestigious Travel Weekly Globe Awards

  • 2016 Global AirRail Alliance Awards

    Hahn Air and Travelport win Best AirRail Distribution Solution at the 2016 Global AirRail Alliance Awards in Helsinki.

  • Travelport UK and Ireland win at the SPAA Awards

    The UK and Ireland team retains the '2016 Best Technology Supplier' title at the Scottish Passenger Agents' Association (SPAA) Awards.

  • 2016 India Travel Awards – North region

    Travelport has positioned itself as the top performer in Indian travel domain with Best GDS awards secured for two consecutive years – 2016 & 2015 India Travel Awards.

  • Best Innovative Global Distribution System (GDS)

    Travelport wins the prestigious industry award at the Travel Weekly Asia's 2016 Readers Choice Awards.

  • eNett wins two Stevie Awards

    eNett wins a silver for Fastest Growing Company of the Year; APAC and a bronze for Anthony Hynes, CEO as Maverick of the Year; changing the game for B2B payments in the travel industry.

  • Best GDS at TTG Travel Awards 2016

    Travelport awarded Best GDS in Asia Pacific for the 8th year running at 2016 TTG Travel Awards

  • Best in mobile special mention award

    The Singapore Airlines’ app developed by MTT was picked for special mention with judges calling it a “comprehensive innovative and integrated consumer experience”.

  • Best technology supplier award

    Travelport has recently been honored with the best technology supplier award at the Travel Agents Association of New Zealand's (TAANZ) National Travel Industry Awards (NTIA) 2016.

  • Certified ISO 27001 compliant

    Demonstrating our commitment to deliver the best technology service, Travelport is proud to be the first Travel Commerce Platform to be certified ISO 27001 compliant.

    Read more

  • thoragentconnection.com wins American Inhouse Design Award

    THOR, Inc. has received a 2016 American Inhouse Design Award from Graphic Design USA (GD USA), in the Internet/Intranet Design category, for its external website, www.THORAgentConnection.com.

  • Travelport Group pickes up three gold and one silver award

    Travelport and its digital services companies Locomote and MTT, were recognised with four innovation awards at the prestigious 2016 Asia-Pacific Stevie Awards

  • Middle Eastern legal team of the year

    Travelport’s Africa, Middle East & South Asia (AFMESA) legal team clinches two awards at the Counsels of the Year Awards Ceremony in Hong Kong attended by legal industry leaders from across Asia and the Middle East.

  • Best app design award 2016

    MTT wins award for Best App Design at Drum Design ceremony in London, England for the easyJet app. The prestigious Drum Awards recognise and reward great design and user experience in consumer facing apps.

  • Most Innovative Travel Technology Partner Award 2016

    Travelport has been voted of the Most Innovative Travel Technology Partner 2016 at the first ever TTJ Jury Choice Award, held at The Grand Hotel, New Delhi, India.

  • Atlanta Journal-Constitution (AJC) top work place award 2015

    Recognized as one of the top workplaces in Atlanta, GA.

    This is the fourth year in a row that Travelport has received this prestigious award from Atlanta’s major daily newspaper for being one of the top places to work in Atlanta.

  • 2015 HSMAI Gold Adrian Award

    The Hospitality Sales & Marketing Association International (HSMAI) have honored THOR with a Gold Adrian Award for its public relations excellence.

  • Innovation Award 2015

    Travelport Smartpoint was recognized in the Benelux after achieving the Innovation Award at Travel Magazine Belgium's Travel Awards

  • Best Technology Provider 2015

    The UK and Ireland team were recently awarded the 'Best Technology Provider' title at the Scottish Passenger Agents' Association (SPAA) Awards.

  • Innovation Award 2015

    Recognized for our industry leading point of sale solution, Travelport Smartpoint. The tool offers travel agents new and impressive functionally.

  • Travel Weekly Magellan Awards

    THOR, Inc. has received a 2015 Silver Magellan Award from Travel Weekly, under the Print Advertising category, for its monthly print and digital travel agent magazine, THOR Advantage.

  • Technology Business of the Year Award

    Recognizing the high level of investment and innovation that has gone into our Travel Commerce Platform.

  • Best Global Distribution System Award

    For our Travel Commerce Platform at the 2015 Business Traveller Africa Awards.

  • Best Air Rail Distribution Solution

    Presented at the Global Air Rail Awards 2015 for the launch of the Airport Express plugin for Travelport Smartpoint.

  • Best Business Development Team

    Awarded the winner at the People Awards 2015.

  • Best Technology Provider 2015

    This award was given to Travelport Rooms and More for the innovation and wide range of product features which brought in immense benefits for the agents.

  • Legal Department of the Year

    The AFMESA legal team have been recognized as the region’s Legal Department of the Year (2015-small team) by the Middle East Corporate Council.

  • India Travel Awards / Best GDS North, South, East & West

    For the second year running Travelport was awarded the best GDS in South India. This year with the recent award for best GDS North India marks a clean sweep for Travelport Galileo, which already received the India Travel Award for East and West region.

  • 2015 Outstanding Travel Technology Provider

    Awarded for the products that were launched last year like Travelport Rooms and More, Travelport Smartpoint and Travelport uAPI which created new momentum and freshness for the travel partners in the industry.

View all

We appreciate the recognition we receive globally from industry associations, travel trade publications and most important, our partner travel agencies – but it’s our customers’ success that drives us.
